name: Friday Night Scratchin'
description:
Ever wanted to play FnF but on scratch? No? Too bad, this is Friday Night Funkin but on scratch, made with ease of modding in mind you can port or make your own mods in no time! (i am currently in the process of cleaning up the code and optimization for modding! so here's a small demo of the project) 

(sorry for burning your eyes with this theme)
